The prompts that the request to the API will be sent with.
children.defaultText: You are a {{ genre_select.selectedOptionLabel }} author. Your task is to write {{ genre_select.selectedOptionLabel }} {{ content_type_select.selectedOptionLabel }}  in a {{tone_style_select.selectedOptionLabel}} language. Answer with "..." if you acknowledge. Don't write anything yet.

children.tooltip: Submit request

children.text: Setting up of the specialized author background

children.tooltip: Insert any additional details or requirements for the story, such as a specific word count or genre constraints
children.label: Optional
children.defaultText: Insert any additional details or requirements for the story, such as a specific word count or genre constraints

children.tooltip: Insert antagonist's name, age, and occupation, as well as a brief description of their personality and motivations
children.label: Antagonist
children.defaultText: Insert antagonist's name, age, and occupation, as well as a brief description of their personality and motivations

children.tooltip: insert a word count knowing that it shouldn't be more than 2650 and no less than 1500 words long

children.tooltip: [insert a word count knowing that it shouldn't be more than 2650 and no less than 1500 words long]
children.onFocus: {{showAlert('The wordcount field will be set in the prompt text, but please, make sure you configured also allowed the  max_tokens configuration so it match it','info')}}
children.label: Wordcount

children.tooltip: Instructions for varying the pace of the story to build and release tension, advance the plot, and create dramatic effect
children.label: Pacing
children.defaultText: [Instructions for varying the pace of the story to build and release tension, advance the plot, and create dramatic effect]

children.tooltip: Insert the desired tone for the story and instructions for maintaining consistency and appropriateness to the setting and characters
children.label: Tone
children.defaultText: [Insert the desired tone for the story and instructions for maintaining consistency and appropriateness to the setting and characters]

children.tooltip: Insert the central theme of the story and instructions for developing it throughout the plot, character, and setting
children.label: Theme
children.defaultText: [Insert the central theme of the story and instructions for developing it throughout the plot, character, and setting]

children.tooltip: Insert the main conflict/problems of the story, including the problem the protagonist faces and the stakes involved caused by the motivation issue
children.label: Conflict / ensuing problem
children.defaultText: [Insert the main conflict/problems of the story, including the problem the protagonist faces and the stakes involved caused by the motivation issue]

children.tooltip: Insert the main motivation/discipline issue facing the protagonist
children.label: Motivation issue
children.defaultText: [Insert the main motivation/discipline issue facing the protagonist]

children.label: Protagonist
children.defaultText: [Insert protagonist's name, age, and occupation, as well as a brief description of their personality and motivations]

children.tooltip: Insert setting details here, including time period, location, and any relevant background information

children.defaultText: [Insert setting details here, including time period, location, and any relevant background information]

children.defaultText: from this chapter list: {{ appsmith.store.awardWinningPromptCHaptersEnumerationList }}, repeat titles of chapters that you acknowledge  from it.

children.text: Setting up of the award-winning Critic background

children.tooltip: The first chapter index you want to include in the prompt
children.label: From:

children.text: Detection of problems and reception of feedback

children.labelTooltip: The prompts that the request to the API will be sent with.
children.defaultText: Can you provide an analysis of the given story using the chapters {{ appsmith.store.awardWinningPromptCHaptersEnumerationList }} and identify areas for improvement or expansion? Please keep in mind that this analysis should be constructive and respectful, focusing on elements such as plot, character development, conflict, resolution, writing style, pacing, coherence, and any other aspects that contribute to the overall quality of the story. only answer using a list of issues that should be addressed while indicating in which chapter the issue was found then a list of overall issues.

children.text: Setting up of the award-winning Author background

children.labelTooltip: The prompts that the request to the API will be sent with.
children.defaultText: I want you to act as an award-winning motivational stories writer. answer with "..." if you understand and acknowledge this, don't write anything else.

children.text: Improvement of the story according to the critic's feedback
